thread.title: XL Group Ltd Announces Quarterly Dividend of $0.22 per Common Share

author: cnbc.com
title: XL Group Ltd Announces Quarterly Dividend of $0.22 per Common Share

organizations.name: about xl group ltd xl group ltd

text:
HAMILTON, Bermuda, Feb. 16, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- XL Group Ltd ("XL" or the "Company") (NYSE: XL) announced today that its Board of Directors declared a quarterly dividend on February 15, 2018 of $0.22 per common share payable on the Company's common shares. The dividend will be payable on April 2, 2018 to common shareholders of record as of March 15, 2018.
About XL Group Ltd
XL Group Ltd (NYSE:XL), through its subsidiaries and under the XL Catlin brand, is a global insurance and reinsurance company providing property, casualty and specialty products to industrial, commercial and professional firms, insurance companies and other enterprises throughout the world. Clients look to XL Catlin for answers to their most complex risks and to help move their world forward. To learn more, visit www.xlgroup.com .
